CustomField.description: ** Defaults Group Name ** Combined with the Search Results Sort Order, this field defines the field to sort group member search results in ascending or descending order. Limited to Community Group Member Fields Only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Defaults Group Name ** Combined with the Search Results Sort Order, this field defines the field to sort group member search results in ascending or descending order. Limited to Community Group Member Fields Only.
CustomField.label: Search Results Sort Field
